results.deck: The final Army Men title from series creators 3DO, this third person shooter ends the Army Men storyline.
results.name: Army Men: Sarge's War

results.deck: It's a new adventure for the Bebop crew as they pursue new outlaws and criminals across the solar system.
results.name: Cowboy Bebop: Tsuioku no Yakyoku

results.deck: Zoo Keeper is a Bejeweled-like puzzle game themed around a zoo.
results.name: Zoo Keeper

results.deck: The King of Fighters 2000 is the seventh installment in the King of Fighters series, featuring an expansion of the "Striker" system.
results.name: The King of Fighters 2000

results.deck: An Armored Core architecture and team management game for PlayStation 2 and PSP.
results.name: Armored Core: Formula Front - Extreme Battle

results.deck: Play the role of Jean-Luc Couger, a special operative for a government agency known as S.C.A.T.
results.name: WinBack: Covert Operations

results.deck: The origins of Dracula and the Belmont clan are revealed for the first time in this 3-D action title of Castlevania for the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Castlevania: Lament of Innocence

results.deck: Sonic Riders stars Sonic and his friends, and their quest to win in the World Grand Prix. Their new rivals are the Babylon Rogues, a mysterious group that has information about the Chaos Emeralds.
results.name: Sonic Riders

results.deck: Here Comes the Pain is a pro wrestling game developed by Yukes exclusively for the Playstation 2
results.name: WWE SmackDown! Here Comes the Pain

results.deck: The story of a young, curious, and green-loving photojournalist named Jade, out to unravel an alien conspiracy on her home planet of Hillys.
results.name: Beyond Good & Evil

results.deck: Mutant Melee is a 4-player fighting game set in the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles universe.
results.name: TMNT: Mutant Melee

results.deck: Take the role of Viewtiful Joe, and save your girlfriend Silvia from the horrible dangers of Movieland.
results.name: Viewtiful Joe

results.deck: Mafia is a sandbox style, third-person action game set in the fictional city of Lost Heaven. The player assumes the role of Tommy Angelo as he rises through the ranks of the Mafia in Depression-era America. The game was developed by Czech developer Illusion Softworks.
results.name: Mafia

results.deck: Disney's Chicken Little: Ace in Action is a follow-up adventure game to Chicken Little movie.
results.name: Disney's Chicken Little: Ace in Action

results.deck: In this sequel to Devil Dice, players use explosive dice to clear the board and solve puzzles.
results.name: Bombastic

results.deck: Rally racing sim developed by Warthog Plc together with popular rally driver Richard Burns, it was praised for its realistic physics and is often regarded as one of the most demanding racing games on the market.
results.name: Richard Burns Rally

results.deck: The war between Heaven and Hell has begun.  It's up to Spawn to save the world from certain destruction.
results.name: Spawn: Armageddon

results.deck: Sequel to Forbidden Siren. Released in 2006.
results.name: Forbidden Siren 2

results.deck: Army Men: Air Attack 2 is the sequel to Amy Men: Air Attack, developed by 3DO, featuring two new helicopters and a new co-pilot.
results.name: Army Men: Air Attack 2

results.deck: Legaia 2: Duel Saga is an RPG that follows the adventures of a group of "Mystics" as they fight for the safety of the world after the Aqualith (a powerful stone that produces endless water) is stolen.
results.name: Legaia 2: Duel Saga

results.deck: A football game from EA sports. With commentary from John Madden & Al Michaels and  St. Louis Rams running back Marshall Faulk on the cover.
results.name: Madden NFL 2003

results.deck: Th3 Plan is a stealth action game built around an elaborate art heist. The game features a unique presentation that allows players to observe missions from three different perspectives simultaneously.
results.name: Th3 Plan

results.deck: Combining the addictive casual gameplay of puzzle game Bejeweled with a fantasy role-playing game, Puzzle Quest was an unexpected hit on every platform it touched.
results.name: Puzzle Quest: Challenge of the Warlords

results.deck: A video game based on the TV show of the same name. As CIA agent Sydney Bristow players use a variety of weapons, gadgets and disguises to fight their way through this stealth-based third-person shooter.
results.name: Alias

results.deck: You are freedom's answer to fear. You stalk terror wherever it hides. These deeds you do so others may live. Hunt down terrorist cells worldwide from London to the Cayman Islands.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Raven Shield

results.deck: A soccer game for a wide range of platforms, endorsed by the world-famous English footballsman David Beckham.
results.name: David Beckham Soccer

results.deck: The King of Fighters: Neowave is a 2D 3-on-3 fighting game in the King of Fighters series, featuring three gameplay styles and new hardware.
results.name: The King of Fighters: Neowave

results.deck: The Warriors is an action adventure 3D brawler that covers and expands the events depicted in the movie of the same name.
results.name: The Warriors

results.deck: Sky Odyssey is an action/adventure flight simulator developed by Cross and published by Activision for the Playstation 2. In the game, players fly through the levels in multiple types of aircraft collecting different items and performing certain challenges.
results.name: Sky Odyssey

results.deck: Bring your bling and live the life of 50 Cent and the G-Unit as they clean up the streets of New York in this ill-regarded third-person shooter.
results.name: 50 Cent: Bulletproof

results.deck: A racing game with cars from the Ford company.
results.name: Ford Bold Moves Street Racing

results.deck: NCAA Football 2004 is an collegiate American football game released in 2003. It was developed by EA Tiburon and published by Electronic Arts. The cover athlete is Heisman Trophy winner and former USC quarterback Carson Palmer.
results.name: NCAA Football 2004

results.deck: The Shadow of Zorro allows players to take the legendary hero on an adventure on PlayStation 2 and PC.
results.name: The Shadow of Zorro

results.deck: Justice League Heroes is an Action-RPG that allows you to play as members of the Justice League of America as they work together to take down the various villains in the game.
results.name: Justice League Heroes

results.deck: The size of the Cooper Gang expands in Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves as they attempt their biggest heist yet: gaining access to the heavily guarded Cooper Vault, which houses all the treasure the Cooper family line has collected over throughout their history.
results.name: Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves

results.deck: Go surfing without getting wet!
results.name: Surfing H3O

results.deck: A formula 1 racing game.
results.name: F1 2001

results.deck: Alter Echo is a third-person action game that allows you to change your EchoPlast suit so that it is in Sword-form, Gun-form or Stealth-form.
results.name: Alter Echo

results.deck: Featured Chris Weinke on the cover, Flordia State quaterback and Heisman Trophy winner.
results.name: NCAA Football 2002

results.deck: An updated version of Outrun 2, Coast 2 Coast adds 15 new tracks, several new cars, and the ability to slipstream to this easygoing arcade racer.
results.name: OutRun 2006: Coast 2 Coast

results.deck: The first game in 989 studios' PlayStation exclusive GameDay series to feature online play.
results.name: NFL GameDay 2003

results.deck: The Legend of Holy Protein is the first Cho Aniki game not developed by Masaya. It is also the first polygonal entry in the series.
results.name: Cho Aniki: Seinaru Protein Densetsu

results.deck: Improving on the original Silent Scope, Dark Silhouette featured a longer campaign, co-op arcade play, divergent paths depending on character choice, and a European setting.
results.name: Silent Scope 2: Dark Silhouette

results.deck: Got a bad case of road rage?  Let out your aggression in this smash-em-up racer.
results.name: Test Drive: Eve of Destruction

results.deck: A half-human, half-vampire secret agent in a tight leather outfit uses guns and razor-sharp tonfa blades to wreak bloody havoc against Nazis seeking supernatural artifacts. Best premise ever? Perhaps.
results.name: BloodRayne

results.deck: A karaoke game made to play with a group of friends.
results.name: Karaoke Revolution Party

results.deck: Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows continues the traditions of the long running multiplayer hack and slash, franchise Gauntlet.
results.name: Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows

results.deck: Be in the hotseat once again! With the next Who wants to be a millionare: Second edition. 15 Questions, 3 lifelines and 1 millions pounds.
results.name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire: Second Edition

results.deck: The fourth installment to the Burnout series, Revenge expands on the fast-paced racing series by adding new features such as same-way Traffic Checking, Vertical Takedowns, Traffic Attack mode, and changes to Crash mode.
results.name: Burnout Revenge

results.deck: This strategic action game follows a four-man squad of SAS or Delta Force troops on missions through Iraq during the Gulf war.
results.name: Conflict: Desert Storm II: Back to Baghdad

results.deck: Agent Under Fire is a game released by EA under the James Bond license. It was the first James Bond game released for the then new generation of consoles.
results.name: 007: Agent Under Fire

results.deck: Madden NFL 07 was the first version of Madden to appear on the Wii and the PS3.  It also added lead blocking controls along with numerous other new features.
results.name: Madden NFL 07

results.deck: Freaky Flyers is a mascot-style racing game that puts characters into tiny, cartoonish planes with power-ups that can help turn the tide of a race.
results.name: Freaky Flyers

results.deck: An action-adventure game based on the movie of the same name. Players can choose to either rule the world as Imhotep or fight as Rick, to save his son, Alex.
results.name: The Mummy Returns

results.deck: Transform and roll out with many of the characters from the live-action movie in this epic action game.
results.name: Transformers: The Game

results.deck: Robotech: Battlecry is an action game based on the Robotech universe.
results.name: Robotech: Battlecry

results.deck: Big Red One is the second game in the Call of Duty series developed by Treyarch, and is not similar to Call of Duty 2.
results.name: Call of Duty 2: Big Red One

results.deck: Devil May Cry 2 is the sequel to the 2001 critically-acclaimed Devil May Cry from Capcom. The game follows returning protagonist Dante and new playable character Lucia as they hack and slash their way through hordes of demons. Fans consider this to be the weakest in the series.
results.name: Devil May Cry 2

results.deck: Medal of Honor Rising Sun moves away from Europe and into Asia where the enemy changes from the Nazis to the Japanese.
results.name: Medal of Honor: Rising Sun

results.deck: Finding Nemo is a game based on the film of the same name.
results.name: Disney/Pixar's Finding Nemo

results.deck: As the world comes to an end through the acts of a cult's sacrifice, a teenage boy is transformed into the Demi-Fiend, neither fully human nor demon.  With opposing forces fighting to shape a new world, he has the power to guide the path of its creation.
results.name: Shin Megami Tensei: Nocturne

results.deck: Street Fighter Anniversary Collection combines SFIII: 3rd Strike and Hyper Street Fighter II: Anniversary Edition onto one disc.
results.name: Street Fighter: Anniversary Collection

results.deck: Unlock your disc with the fifth game in the Monster Rancher series, Monster Rancher EVO!
results.name: Monster Rancher EVO

results.deck: ESPN NBA Basketball (also known as NBA 2K4) is the fifth installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2003/2004 NBA season while adding a new player manuever system (using the right analog stick) and a new player creation/training mode.
results.name: ESPN NBA Basketball 2004

results.deck: Kate Walker, a successful lawyer, travels to find Hans, the sole heir to a factory and eventually ends up on a journey to find him and the once thought to be extinct Mammoths.
results.name: Syberia

results.deck: A Japanese compilation of a top-down bullet hell shooter and an adventure game.
results.name: Psikyo Shooting Collection Vol. 3: Sol Divide & Dragon Blaze

results.deck: Jackie Chan Adventures is an action adventure game based on the television show with the same name.
results.name: Jackie Chan Adventures

results.deck: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City is the second 3D game in the series and sixth original title. It features more of the same sand-box action-adventure gameplay with a new 1980s setting, new characters, new weapons and much more.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City

results.deck: The seventh game in the Leisure Suit Larry series takes the franchise to college.
results.name: Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude

results.deck: Based off the hit anime and manga series Lupin the 3rd, players play as Lupin and his partners in crime as they try to steal the vast fortune of The Sorcerer King while on the run from Inspector Zenigata.
results.name: Lupin the 3rd: Treasure of the Sorcerer King

results.deck: A digital adaptation of the classic board game.
results.name: RISK: Global Domination

results.deck: 30 mini games featuring Jim Henson's Muppets
results.name: Jim Henson's Muppets Party Cruise

results.deck: First released on PlayStation 2 as a budget title and later ported to the Wii; Star Trek: Conquest is a strategy game that uses several races from Star Trek as its playable factions, though no specific characters from the universe make an appearance.
results.name: Star Trek: Conquest

results.deck: The first and only console entry in the revered PC strategy series is, despite the name, a remake of King's Bounty, which preceded the Heroes series by a few years.
results.name: Heroes of Might and Magic: Quest for the DragonBone Staff

results.deck: Tak and the Power of Juju was the flagship title in the Tak franchise.  As Tak, the player embarks on a whimsical platforming adventure to bring peace to the Pupanunu people.
results.name: Tak and the Power of Juju

results.deck: The third game of the SSX franchise, SSX3 continues the tradition of over-the-top Uber Tricks, super stylistic characters and introduces the "One Mountain" concept.
results.name: SSX 3

results.deck: My Street puts you in control of your created character as he/she tries to beat kids at their own game, and earn the bullies' respect before the school year stars.
results.name: My Street

results.deck: A heavily anime-inspired third person action game, Oni attempts to blend gun play and traditional brawler gameplay together.
results.name: Oni

results.deck: RPG Maker 3 is a user friendly tool that allows you to create your own 3D RPG without needing to know a programming language
results.name: RPG Maker 3
